content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment, Hassan. As the landlord, I would like to offer you the best possible rental price for our apartment. What is your budget for renting a 25-square-meter apartment in Munich?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 800 Euro per month. I want to be on good terms with my landlord. Can you offer me a discount or anything else?

I am a student and I need to be very careful with my budget. I want to make sure that I am renting the apartment for the lowest possible price. Is there anything you can do to help me with that?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Of course, Hassan. As a landlord, I understand your concerns about budgeting as a student. I am willing to work with you to find a rental price that fits your budget. May I know more about your needs and preferences for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Sure, I would like a modern and clean apartment with good lighting. I also prefer a quiet neighborhood. Is there anything else you can do to help me with the rental price?

I would also like to know if the apartment is fully furnished or if I need to buy my own furniture. Thank you for your help.

I would like to negotiate the rental price with you. Can you propose a price for the apartment?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for your preferences, Hassan. I can assure you that the apartment is modern and clean, with good lighting. It is located in a quiet neighborhood as well. As for the furniture, the apartment is partially furnished, but you may need to purchase some additional items to your liking.

Regarding the rental price, I am willing to offer you a discount of 50 Euros per month for your first six months of rent. So, the total rental price for the first six months would be 750 Euros per month. After the first six months, the rental price would be 800 Euros per month. Would you agree to this price?
name: Heinrich Heine
